articles.title: National Meeting for Celebrating 70th Anniversary of KCU Held
articles.content:
National Meeting for Celebrating 70th Anniversary of KCU Held
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A national meeting for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Su Gil, delegates of the children's union who were selected from the children's union organizations across the country, instructors of the KCU organizations, officials concerned and officials of working people's organizations and youth league.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), read out a congratulatory message the WPK Central Committee sent to organizations and members of the KCU.
					
					 The message said that the 70 year-long history covered by the KCU is the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who ushered in a shining heyday of building the revolutionary children's organization and the children's movement with their noble love for younger generations and wise leadership, and the proud history of the revolutionary children's organization which brought up the members of the KCU as reliable successors who would shoulder the future of Korea and future members of the youth league.
					
					 The KCU has fully carried out honorable mission and duty of preparing the members of the KCU to be successors who would shoulder the future of Korea while setting an example in the building of the revolutionary children's organization and the children's movement during the past seven decades. 
					
					 The message said that it is a joy and pride of the WPK and people that the members of the KCU are growing up to be pillars who would shoulder the future of Korea. Thanks to three million child revolutionaries, the bright future of the youth power is guaranteed and the DPRK is winning victories as a thriving socialist nation, the message noted.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, in a report called upon all the members of the KCU to hold in high esteem Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun and defend and glorify the feats the Generalissimo performed in the history of the Korean children's movement. 
					
					 He called upon all the members of the KCU to prepare themselves to be young revolutionaries, boundlessly loyal to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations was held at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the 70th founding anniversary of the KCU.
					 Present there were delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the KCU and schoolchildren in the city.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and those of the youth league.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the portraits of smiling great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Led by Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, all the participants took the following pledge, reflecting the loyalty of the three million members of the KCU to give steady continuity to the cause of the Juche revolution by following Marshal Kim Jong Un, looking up to the portraits:
					
					 We will hold the Generalissimos who dedicated themselves to the happiness and rosy future of the rising generation all their lives in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche for all ages and firmly defend and glorify for all ages the undying revolutionary feats they performed for the history of the Korean children's movement.
					
					 We, bearing deep in mind that there are a worthy life and happiness and beautiful hope will be in bloom thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, will become the genuine children's guards in the era of Songun who are devotedly defending the safety and authority of the Marshal just as heroes Kim Ki Song and Kim Kum Sun of the anti-Japanese Children's Corps and juvenile guerrillas during the Fatherland Liberation War did.
					
					 We will bear deep in mind that there is the way of developing the KCU into the glorious one of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever and glorifying the honor of being members of the KCU on the road of faithfully upholding the leadership of the greatest Marshal, think and act as taught by the Marshal, when doing even a single work of the KCU and taking a step, and always advance straight, following the party.
					
					 All the participants took a pledge to become genuine sons and daughters and ardent juvenile revolutionaries of the Marshal who are always getting ready for the socialist homeland.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Children's Camp Inaugurated
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Children's Camp Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A ceremony took place on Monday to mark the successful completion of the remodeling of the Mangyongdae Children's Camp thanks to the noble love of supreme leader Kim Jong Un for the younger generation and the future.
					 It is situated on the foot of picturesque Mt. Ryongak in Pyongyang.
					
					 The camp has all the best conditions and environment necessary for the camping life of schoolchildren such as modern lodging buildings, restaurant, halls, library, folk game ground, animal shed, boating pool, outdoor swimming pool, outdoor basketball court and playground.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Kim Su Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations and education institutions in Pyongyang, teaching staff of the camp, campers, members of the children's union in the city and members of the shock brigade who participated in the remodeling project.
					
					 Kim Su Gil made an inaugural address.
					
					 He said that the camp is the product of the noble view of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un on the rising generation.
					
					 Speeches were made by officials and employees of the camp.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the camp.
					
					 Meanwhile, the first-term camping started on the same day.
					
					 Participating in the camping were members of the children's union of junior secondary schools in Pyongyang and children of the workers in the field of munitions industry.
					
					 The campers laid floral baskets and bouquets before the mosaic depicting the image of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung at the camp and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Delegates of KCU
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Delegates of KCU
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A birthday party was given at the April 25 Hotel on Monday for delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 Present there were officials concerned and delegates marking their birthdays.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a speech there.
					
					 He said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un invited the delegates of the children's union from across the country to the celebrations the 70th founding anniversary of the KCU and made sure that a birthday party was given for those delegates marking their birthdays during their stay in Pyongyang.
					
					 He called upon the delegates of the union to prepare themselves as excellent talents of the revolution, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, and successors who would shoulder upon the future of Korea, always bearing in mind the loving care shown by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Lays Wreath before Mausoleum of Ho Chi Minh
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Lays Wreath before Mausoleum of Ho Chi Minh
 Hanoi, June 5 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on a visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam laid a wreath before the mausoleum of President Ho Chi Minh in Hanoi on Sunday.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were members of the WPK delegation led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, and members of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.
					
					 The participants laid a wreath before the mausoleum of Ho Chi Minh in the name of the WPK delegation and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Warmongers Infiltrate Fishing Boats into Hotspot Waters in West Sea Again
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Warmongers Infiltrate Fishing Boats into Hotspot Waters in West Sea Again
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet military infiltrated again the territorial waters of the DPRK side in the West Sea of Korea at around 4:30 on Sunday.
					 The puppet forces infiltrated 19 fishing boats based in waters off Yonphyong Island deep into the DPRK side across the extension of the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 This has rendered the situation in the hotspot waters in the West Sea of Korea tense again.
					
					 The south Korean media report that the advance northward of a group of fishing boats under "allowance by the military" created the "touch-and-go situation" in which those boats could be "seized" by the army of the north or they could be "attacked by its coastal artillery pieces".
					
					 The recent case is a product of the sordid intention of the puppet forces to cause a shocking case in the above-said waters, lead the Korean People's Army to just counteraction and then brand it as "threat" and "provocation" as it is just an extension of the reckless provocation by the artillery pieces of the puppet forces against a ferryboat of the Korean People's Army on May 27.
					
					 What is different is that the past provocation by artillery pieces was directly committed by the gangsters of the puppet military but this time they used innocent fishermen as a sacrificial offering for confrontation with fellow countrymen in fear of merciless punishment by the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The true aim sought by the recent provocation is to render the situation in the waters tense and chill the atmosphere of dialogue for the north-south relations on one hand and to maintain the illegal and gangster-like "northern limit line" at any cost on the other hand.
					
					 In order to conceal their crimes the puppet forces are even floating sophism that the fishing boats in waters off Yonphyong Island entered the waters of the north side to capture two Chinese fishing boats which were under illegal operation.
					
					 It is a childish farce that can be cooked up only by the south Korean puppet forces to claim that fishing boat seizes fishing boat.
					
					 Such act aimed at escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen will only force the provokers to pay a dear price.

articles.title: President of ITF Here
articles.content:
President of ITF Here
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, arrived here on Monday to participate in the event for marking the 50th founding anniversary of the federation.

articles.title: Lao Women's Union Delegation Here
articles.content:
Lao Women's Union Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Women's Union headed by Inlavanh Keobounphanh, president of its Central Committee who is a member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: German Delegation Departs
articles.content:
German Delegation Departs
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany led by Chairman Michael Koth left here for home Monday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong I
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Women's Union visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, the president of the International Taekwon－Do Federation visited the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them on the same day.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of KCU Marked across Country
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of KCU Marked across Country
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) across the country stoutly growing up to be pillars of Songun Korea significantly celebrated its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The schoolchildren laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling Generalissimos across the country and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Joint meetings of the KCU organizations took place in Pyongyang and provinces on the occasion.
					
					 Combined art performances were given by schoolchildren in all provinces including South Hwanghae, Jagang, North Hamgyong and South Hamgyong Provinces.
					
					 Colorful sports and amusement games of schoolchildren were held at primary and secondary schools including Segari Primary School in Pothonggang District, Munsu Primary School in Taedonggang District and Kimchaek Primary School in Kimchaek City.
					
					 Schoolchildren's happy laughter was heard from the resorts for people including the Munsu Water Park and the Kaeson Youth Park.

articles.title: DPRK Government Shows Deep Care for Posterity
articles.content:
DPRK Government Shows Deep Care for Posterity
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Children's Camp in the DPRK was recently renovated into a comprehensive extracurricular education base, a luxurious palace for schoolchildren.
					 It has such enough conditions for schoolchildren's pleasant camping as a cultural house, boating-ground, animal house, open-air swimming pool and play ground.
					
					 In the DPRK the work for rising generations is regarded as a top priority in the party and state affairs and many edifices for children have appeared one after another.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has shown paternal love for all children across the country, with the same noble outlook on posterity as the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il had.
					
					 When visiting the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill arranged with bag cloth production process in January this year, he said that he felt satisfied and pleased, picturing to himself the children going to and from school with home-made fashionable bags.
					
					 In April he visited the newly-built Mindulle Notebook Factory and stressed the need for the factory not to stop the production even a moment for the sake of schoolchildren, saying that the Party would settle any problems arising in its operation.
					
					 Under such loving care of Kim Jong Un, modern baby homes and orphanages and orphans schools have taken their shapes in different parts of the country, including Wonsan orphans' primary and secondary schools, this year.
					
					 The children in the DPRK are now preparing themselves as reliable pillars for prosperous Korea.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is a modern comprehensive extracurricular education center for schoolchildren and a pedigree establishment for training them into talents.
					 Seen on the upper part of its main building are letters reading "We Are the Happiest in the World" and "Dash toward Future."
					
					 At the palace with various hobby groups, schoolchildren cultivate their talents to the full to become promising scientists, athletes and artists for the nation, enjoying the benefits of the advantageous socialist education system.
					
					 Over the last two decades, the palace has produced a large number of professional artists and athletes, winners of literary prize and other talents.
					
					 Nearly 1,000 graduates of it are now active as singers or instrumentalists at professional art troupes, including famous Moranbong and Chongbong bands.
					
					 And at least 1,100 have played an important role in the development of the country's sports. Among them are Ri Se Gwang, a twice world champion who won the titles at the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships and other international tournaments and presented "Ri Se Gwang Movement", and Ro Song Hui who bagged gold medals at the 12th World Taekwon-Do Championships and other international games.
					
					 The palace gives a glimpse of the DPRK's educational development and rosy future.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes KCU's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes KCU's Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					　The seven decades covered by the KCU is an unforgettable road on which the idea of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on the Juche-oriented children's  movement and their great  leadership exploits have been strikingly demonstrated and a proud path along which the noble ideological and moral world of the KCU members has steadily grown stronger, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The KCU is the glorious KCU of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il which had been developed under their warm care.
					
					 Kim Il Sung started the Juche-oriented children's movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese war and provided its deep and strong roots.  He established the most popular universal free educational system, providing all students across the country with new school uniforms and bringing up the members of the KCU to be genuine sons and daughters of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il regarded it as an important work related to the future of the revolution to train the younger generation and spared nothing for the schoolchildren, protecting the bright smile and happiness of the children from every storm and stress.
					
					 The new century of Juche is being recorded as a special one in the development of the KCU thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the tender-hearted father of the schoolchildren as he is taking them to his arms and showing all sorts of loving care for them by carrying forward the great leaders' love for the younger generation and the future.
					
					 There are many countries and schoolchildren in the world but it is only the members of the KCU who are steadfastly succeeding to the revolution, enjoying all benefits of socialism under the care of the great party. 
					
					 The KCU will always shed its brilliant rays as the glorious KCU of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as it is dynamically advancing under its unfurled flag, holding the banner bearing the immortal beaming images of the great leaders in its van.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Military Gangsters' Saber-rattling against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Military Gangsters' Saber-rattling against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet warmongers committed such provocation as firing 40 mm artillery shots at a ferryboat of the Navy of the Korean People's Army on a routine duty in the hotspot in the West Sea.
					 Meanwhile, the special warfare command of the south Korean puppet Ground Force is busy training special agents tasked to destroy strategic vantages of the north and forming a special unit to carry out "beheading operation" in contingency.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday terms their military provocations deliberate moves to stem the trend of north-south dialogue and escalate tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The ulterior aim of the south Korean puppet military forces is to secure a justification for igniting a war by steadily increasing tensions through ceaseless military provocations and escalate their war moves and thus carry out their scenario for invading the north at any cost, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Their training of special agents and formation of a special unit under the "beheading operation" are designed to serve the above-said purpose.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the south Korean authorities are working with bloodshot eyes to seize the DPRK by force of arms, while persistently turning down its patriotic call for having dialogue and mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should be wholly responsible for the worst crisis in the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They would be well advised to stop going reckless, bearing in mind that their reckless moves to hurt the dignity of the DPRK and bring down its social system by force of arms are as foolish as inviting merciless revenge and final ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Call for Marking Anniversary of Publication of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Call for Marking Anniversary of Publication of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Organizations for the reunification movement in South Kyongsang Province, south Korea declared they would hold diverse events for reunification on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, according to the south Korean on-line newspaper Oh My News on May 30.
					 They said they would hold a seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and other events for reunification. 
					
					 The South Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration called on citizens to turn out as one in the patriotic work for reunification.

articles.title: Japanese Conservative Forces Pressurize S. Korean Authorities to Implement "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese Conservative Forces Pressurize S. Korean Authorities to Implement "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The conservative forces of Japan are forcing the south Korean authorities to implement the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 Dietmen from the Japanese ruling Liberal Democratic Party at a joint meeting of the headquarters for diplomatic and economic cooperation, etc. held in Tokyo on June 1 claimed that the Japanese government should not donate a billion yen to the "Foundation for Comfort Women" unless the issue of pulling down the girl statue before the Japanese embassy in Seoul is settled.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should sincerely repent of the past crimes and make an apology for them, though belatedly.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report on Review of Work of C.C., WPK Held in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report on Review of Work of C.C., WPK Held in Czech Republic 
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party Korea (WPK) in Prague on June 1.
					 Present at the seminar were figures of political parties and an organization including the Czechoslovak Communist Party and the Communist Party-21 of the Czech Republic and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association.
					
					 Zdenek Klimek, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party-21 of the Czech Republic, said that in his report Kim Jong Un comprehensively reviewed the shining victories and proud successes achieved by the WPK and the heroic Korean people.
					
					 The general secretary said that the Korean people would successfully carry out the important tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK, adding that Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the strategic line and tasks for accomplishing the cause of socialism, holding high the banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Josef Servista, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said that Kim Jong Un's report serves as important guidelines to be upheld not only by the Korean people but also by the progressive people of the world and called for lifting the voices of support and solidarity with the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Reported by Bulgarian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Reported by Bulgarian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The May issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo carried a special write-up illustrated with the photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The newspaper said in an article titled "Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK was held in Pyongyang with splendor amid the great attention of the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the WPK at its congress.
					
					 The congress elected him as chairman of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by International Body
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by International Body
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on May 28 posted an article titled "Joy in May" on its website One Corea Network.
					 The article said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) brought immense joy to the Korean people and caused a great political quake in the world, adding that a lot of media simultaneously reported about this news as special flash news under titles "First secretary Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK" and the "Meaning of election of Chairman Kim Jong Un, the only leader, and tasks" illustrated with his photos.
					
					 The leader is devoting his all to the people and building the country into a people's paradise relying on them, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The people's paradise which is being built relying on the efforts and will of the leader is, indeed, an ideal society desired by the world.
					
					 Only victory and glory of May are in store for the DPRK, the country of single-minded unity in which the people trust and follow the leader as a father and which forms an invincible integral whole, and the day when the earth is bright with the glow of Juche is sure to come.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia led by its president visited the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on May 31 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket in the name of the party before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The president of the party said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was an outstanding statesman and the leader of the people who developed the WPK into an invincible party which formed a harmonious whole with the leader and the masses and a true people's party which serves the people, regarding the Juche idea founded by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as guidelines.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK at its 7th Congress is another great fortune for the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater success in their struggle for carrying out the important tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article on its website on May 25.
					 The U.S. should clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK which joined the advanced ranks of nuclear powers and face up to the trend of the times and roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is a product of the anachronistic daydream of insisting only on its unilateral brigandish demand, disregarding the changed situation and the trend of the times.
					
					 It is also a product of ignorance and benightedness based on the jungle law without any elementary understanding of its rival.
					
					 It is a hard reality today when a dagger is thrust into the neck of the U.S. which came into being through aggression and has grown corpulent through wars and it is threatened with a nuclear time-bomb hanging on its back ready to blow up its whole mainland.
					
					 Whether the U.S. survives or ceases to exist hinges on the DPRK's will and determination.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK as early as possible, foreseeing the future of the relations between them.

articles.title: Acto central por 70o aniversario de fundacion de ONC
articles.content:
Acto central por 70o aniversario de fundacion de ONC
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea. 
					Asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Su Gil, los delegados de la ONC electos en las organizaciones de la ONC de todo el pais y los instructores de ninos escolares, los funcionarios interesados y de organizaciones de masas y de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, transmitio un mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC enviado a las organizaciones y miembros de la ONC. 
					
					La misiva senala que la trayectoria de 70 anos de la ONC es la historia revolucionaria de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, quienes con el noble amor a las generaciones venideras y con la sabia orientacion abrieron la era dorada de la construccion de la organizacion infantil revolucionaria y su movimiento, y la orgullosa de la organizacion infantil revolucionaria que ha formado a los integrantes de la ONC como fidedignos continuadores y relevos de la UJS que se encargaran del futuro de Corea. 
					
					Recuerda que durante 70 anos que datan de su fundacion, la ONC ha cumplido satisfactoriamente su honrosa mision y deber de formar a sus miembros como continuadores de la revolucion coreana creando el modelo del movimiento infantil y de la construccion de la organizacion infantil revolucionaria. 
					
					Los miembros de la ONC crecen como pilares de la patria, lo que es la alegria y orgullo del PTC y el pueblo coreano, destaca y apunta que gracias a tener el contingente de 3 millones de revolucionarios infantiles, sera radiante el futuro de la potencia de la juventud y saldra siempre victoriosa la patria como potencia socialista. 
					
					Al presentar el informe de festejo, Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, enfatizo que todos los miembros de la ONC deben enaltecer a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il como eterno Sol y defender sus proezas realizadas en el movimiento infantil de Corea. 
					
					Y llamo a todos los integrantes de la ONC a prepararse como fidedignos revolucionarios infantiles infinitamente fieles al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Celebrado acto nacional de ONC por 70o aniversario de fundacion de ONC
articles.content:
Celebrado acto nacional de ONC por 70o aniversario de fundacion de ONC
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan el acto nacional de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC) por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de esta organizacion infantil. 
					Participaron los delegados a los actos festivos por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la ONC y los ninos escolares de esta capital.
					
					Tomaron asientos de la tribuna el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, los funcionarios interesados y de la UJS. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus imagenes sonrientes. 
					
					Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la UJS, recito la resolucion de 3 millones de miembros de la ONC dirigida al Mariscal. 
					
					Mirando las imagenes sonrientes de los grandes Lideres antecesores y reflejando el sentimiento de fidelidad de los integrantes de la ONC de todo el pais de continuar firmemente el linaje de la revolucion jucheana y a la voz guia de Jon Yong Nam, los participantes juraron como lo siguiente:
					
					Enalteceremos a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, quienes durante toda su vida dedicaron todo lo suyo para la felicidad y el radiante porvenir de las generaciones venideras, como eterno Sol del Juche y defenderemos firmemente y glorificaremos para siempre sus proezas revolucionarias imperecederas realizadas en el movimiento infantil coreano. 
					
					Seremos verdaderas vanguardias infantiles de la era del Songun que defienden a riesgo de la vida la seguridad y el prestigio del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como hicieron los heroes del Cuerpo Infantil Antijapones Kim Ki Song y Kim Kum Sun y los guerrilleros infantiles del periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, teniendo bien presente que gracias al Mariscal se aseguran la autentica vida, la felicidad y la esperanza hermosa nuestras. 
					
					Al grabar en el fondo del corazon el que en seguir fielmente la orientacion del Mariscal hay el camino de consolidar la ONC como la gloriosa organizacion de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y glorificar para siempre el honor de los miembros de la ONC, pensaremos y actuaremos siempre segun las instrucciones dadas por el Mariscal y marcharemos siempre recto por el camino indicado por el Partido. 
					
					Por ultimo, tomaron la decision de hacerse verdaderos hijos del Mariscal y fervientes revolucionarios infantiles preparandose siempre por la patria socialista.

articles.title: Delegacion de PTC se reune con Nguyen Phu Trong
articles.content:
Delegacion de PTC se reune con Nguyen Phu Trong
Hanoi, 6 de junio (corresponsal de ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezada por Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, de visita en la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, departio el dia 6 en la sede del CC del partido con Nguyen Phu Trong, secretario general del CC del Partido Comunista de Vietnam.
					　Choe dijo que el VII Congreso del PTC eligio al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC reflejando la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del pueblo.
					
					　Se refirio a que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos se movilizaron como un solo hombre en la lucha por la materializacion de la resolucion del congreso del partido y a los invariables esfuerzos de nuestro partido y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo. 
					
					　Felicito la realizacion exitosa del XII Congreso del PCV y la reeleccion de Nguyen Phu Trong como secretario general y deseo al partido y el pueblo de Vietnam mayores exitos en las labores para construir Vietnam socialista prospero en acato a la resolucion del congreso del partido. 
					
					　Expuso la posicion de principios del PTC de intensificar y desarrollar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y los pueblos de los dos paises preparadas por los lideres antecedentes de la RPDC y Vietnam y atendidas profundamente por los dirigentes maximos de los dos paises.
					
					　A su vez, Nguyen Phu Trong senalo que extiende una vez mas la calurosa felicitacion al camarada Kim Jong Un elegido como Presidente del PTC y a la exitosa efectuacion del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					　Puntualizo que el Presidente del PTC, Kim Jong Un, envio la delegacion de alto rango del partido y remitio hasta el mensaje oral lo cual prueba claramente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos partidos y los dos paises. 
					
					　Asevero que las relaciones de amistad entre Vietnam y la RPDC, preparadas por el presidente Ho Chi Minh y el companero Kim Il Sung, han venido desarrollandose positivamente bajo la profunda atencion de los dirigentes de los dos paises a lo largo de varias generaciones y confirmo que consolidar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo coreanos es la posicion invariable del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Vietnam.
					
					  Subrayo que envia irrestricto apoyo a la lucha del hermano pueblo coreano por lograr el desarrollo socio-economico y la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Delegacion de PTC deposita ofrenda floral ante mausoleo de Ho Chi Minh
articles.content:
Delegacion de PTC deposita ofrenda floral ante mausoleo de Ho Chi Minh
Hanoi, 5 de junio (corresponsal de ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, de visita en la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, deposito el dia 5 una ofrenda floral ante el mausoleo del presidente Ho Chi Minh en Hanoi.
					En la ceremonia de homenaje estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion coreana encabezada por Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, y los integrantes del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam. 
					
					Los participantes colocaron una ofrenda a nombre de la delegacion del PTC y rindieron el homenaje.

articles.title: Presidente de Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo llega a Pyongyang
articles.content:
Presidente de Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo llega a Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles), Ri Yong Son, llego hoy a esta capital para tomar parte en los actos en celebracion del 50o aniversario de la fundacion de la ITF.
